info.title: FireInvent
info.description: Manage your inventory a modern way!

get.description: Returns a list of all departments.
Returns a department by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a department by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all persons in a department
get.description: Returns all persons that are members of the given department.
Returns a list of all item assignment histories.

post.description: Creates a new item assignment history.

400.description: Invalid input or referenced item/person does not exist

409.description: An overlapping assignment already exists for this item

get.description: Returns a item assignment history by its unique ID.

put.description: Updates an existing item assignment history.

400.description: ID mismatch or referenced item/person does not exist

409.description: An overlapping assignment already exists for this item

delete.description: Deletes a item assignment history by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all items.

400.description: Invalid input or referenced variant/location not found

409.description: A item with the same identifier already exists

get.description: Returns a item by its unique ID.

400.description: ID mismatch or referenced variant/location not found

409.description: A item with the same identifier already exists

delete.description: Deletes a item by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all assignments for a item
get.description: Returns all assignment histories for a specific item.

get.summary: List all maintenances for a item
get.description: Returns all maintenance records for a specific item.
Returns a list of all maintenance records.

get.description: Returns a maintenance record by its unique ID.

400.description: ID mismatch or referenced item does not exist

delete.description: Deletes a maintenance record by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all maintenanceTypes.
Returns a maintenanceType by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a maintenanceType by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all orders.
Returns an order by its unique ID.

404.description: Order not found or cannot be updated

delete.description: Deletes an order by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all persons.

409.description: Person with same name or external ID already exists

get.description: Returns a single person by their unique ID.
Returns a list of all products.

409.description: A product with the same name and manufacturer already exists

get.description: Returns a product by its unique ID.

409.description: A product with the same name and manufacturer already exists

delete.description: Deletes a product by its unique ID.

get.summary: List all variants for a product
get.description: Returns all variants for a specific product.
Returns a list of all productTypes.
Returns a productType by its unique ID.

delete.description: Deletes a productType by its unique ID.

get.description: Returns a list of all storage locations.

409.description: A storage location with the same name already exists

get.description: Returns a storage location by its unique ID.

409.description: A storage location with the same name already exists

delete.description: Deletes a storage location by its unique ID.

Returns a list of all variants.
